props.name: allowOtherMenus
props.desc: True to allow multiple menus to be displayed at the same time (defaults to false)

props.name: defaultAlign
props.desc:
The default {@link Roo.Element#alignTo) anchor position value for this menu
relative to its element of origin (defaults to "tl-bl?")

props.name: minWidth
props.desc: The minimum width of the menu in pixels (defaults to 120)

props.name: registerMenu
props.desc: True (default) - means that clicking on screen etc. hides it.

props.name: shadow
props.desc:
True or "sides" for the default effect, "frame" for 4-way shadow, and "drop"
for bottom-right shadow (defaults to "sides")

props.name: subMenuAlign
props.desc:
The {@link Roo.Element#alignTo} anchor position value to use for submenus of
this menu (defaults to "tl-tr?")

events.name: beforehide
events.desc: Fires before this menu is hidden

events.name: beforeshow
events.desc: Fires before this menu is displayed

events.name: click
events.desc: Fires when this menu is clicked (or when the enter key is pressed while it is active)

events.name: hide
events.desc: Fires after this menu is hidden

events.name: itemclick
events.desc: Fires when a menu item contained in this menu is clicked

events.name: mouseout
events.desc: Fires when the mouse exits this menu

events.name: mouseover
events.desc: Fires when the mouse is hovering over this menu

events.name: show
events.desc: Fires after this menu is displayed
